name: Bison Steak
desc: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack) .
notes:
The Bison Steak is an item introduced in the Hidden Realms Update.
The item grants the player a flat +25 maximum HP (+25 HP per stack).


== Notes ==
This item gets extra value out of health-increasing items such as  Transcendence,  Stone Flux Pauldron,  Spinel Tonic,  Pearl and  Irradiant Pearl. For instance, one Transcendence will allow the Bison Steak to provide a flat +37.5 maximum health instead of the usual +25.
Conversely, any reduction to maximum health (like from  Shaped Glass or  Tonic Affliction) will lessen the value of this item. One Shaped Glass will bring the health bonus down from +25 to a mere +12.5.
With Artifact of Glass this item only grants 10% (2.5 HP) per stack.
This item provides Growth when used on   False Son.
If used in the Wandering CHEF, this item can be upgraded into  Seared Steak if combined with a  Mocha,  Eclipse Lite,  Power Elixir,  Energy Drink,  Bustling Fungus,  Cautious Slug,  Monster Tooth, or another  Bison Steak. This will double the flat health increase and add a small percentage increase to max health as well.

== Trivia ==
When Fresh Meat was first added, it increased base health regeneration by +2 hp/s for 3s (+3s per stack) after killing an enemy.
The effect of the Fresh Meat that the Bison Steak replaced is similar to the Meat Nugget from Risk of Rain 1, which has a chance to drop healing meat nuggets when damaging an enemy.
